reporter_caption.center: SOUTHEASTERN PROPERTIES, INC. v. LEE, 368 So.2d 289 (Ala.Civ.App. 1979)

caption.center: SOUTHEASTERN PROPERTIES, INC., a corporation, and Harold Johnson v.
William L. LEE, III, Lucy Stuart Lee, Barry Richard Kraselsky and Dale M.

court.center: Court of Civil Appeals of Alabama.

opinion.opinion_text:
Upon remand to this court by the Supreme Court of Alabama, it is considered that this cause should be affirmed in accordance with the opinion rendered by the Supreme Court of Alabama on February 9, 1979, 368 So.2d 288.
AFFIRMED.
WRIGHT, P.J., and HOLMES, J., concur.
